price: نو باد مو ورته تابع كړ چې په نرمۍ سره به هر هغه ځاى ته چلېدلو چې د ده به اراده وه.
arabic: فَسَخَّرۡنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيۡثُ أَصَابَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fasakharnā lahu al-rīḥa tajrī bi-amrihi rukhāan ḥaythu aṣāba
